channel.title: How to make an npc drop another npc - if possible
channel.description: Hey, im planning on a sort of minigame/new boss, a tiny bit like the domination tower. You would start off with let's say a goblin then kill that, and it would drop a rock crab, then another npc all the way up to corp. If this is possible, how would you do it?
